entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Lac-Saint-Jean
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:07 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -11.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Roberval Airport 08:03 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -11.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -13.3°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
